title: George Washington Birthplace National Monument: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do      Visitor Center includes exhibits, film, bookstore, and restrooms.  Ranger talks offered on the hour 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. -Inquire about the location and specifics of the ranger program at the visitor center  Living Colonial Farm features heritage livestock and tobacco.  Special events offer costumed interpreters and demonstrations.  Washington Family Burial Ground.  Picnic area with tables, grills, pavilion and restrooms. Two mile loop Nature Trail accessed either from Historic Area or at the Picnic Area.  The Potomac River beach offers view of the river and Maryland, walking, sunbathing, and fishing. Pets: Pets are not allowed in the Historic Area. In all other parts of the park please remember to keep your pets on leashes at ALL times while hiking, walking or jogging . We hope you enjoy visiting YOUR National Park!
